4.title: Classification of Amazon food reviews
4.description: Performed sentiment classification of Amazon food reviews using Naive Bayes, Logistic Regression, XgBoost and LSTM algorithms. Vectorizers include Bag of Words and TF-IDF. Carried out extensive feature engineering on review text to attain accuracies in the range 91% and 94%.

3.title: Linux Shell Implementation
3.description: Implemented a shell program using basic Linux system calls in C like fork and execvp. Shell supports I/O redirection, pipes, history, background process and globbing.

2.title: Dynamic channel access scheme for IEEE 802.11ah protocol
2.description: Presented a comparative study of traditional DCF vs 802.11e EDCA based channel access scheme. Conceptualized a dynamic access scheme by predicting channel access parameter values using hierarchical clustering and regression tree machine learning algorithms.

1.title: Huffman encoding and decoding
1.description: Implemented Huffman encoder and decoder using priority queues in C++. Compared performance of priority queues and binary heaps by generating Huffman trees over thousands of records.
